Description:
Harald joins James to talk through customizing chat, agents, and GitHub Copilot with custom instructions, prompts, and modes. We go deeper int new proposed APIs that pulls them together to create agents and how Harald implement agent memory and shipped it as an extension!

Episode Links Customize chat and agents - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/overview Custom instructions - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/custom-instructions Prompt Files - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/prompt-files Chat Agent Modes - https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/customization/custom-chat-modes Agent memory extension - https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=digitarald.agent-memory
